resources.string: Welcome to the Velvet Room.
This place exists between dream and reality, mind and matter.
I am Igor, a servant of Philemon.
But that\'s not important at this moment.
Your world is in grave danger.
Demons from other dimensions threaten your peaceful lives.
I see that you hold a smartphone in your hands.
The technology behind such devices is unknown to me, but I know that they can be helpful.
I can give you a Demonscope - a device that can find and reveal demons around you.
But first, tell me about you. What\'s your name?
Good, %1$s %2$s. I have already ended preparations for your Demonscope.
To use it, enable the GPS of your device. Wait for the Demonscope to find your position, and push the green button to reveal demons around you.
You must then concentrate and use your mind to dispel the demon\'s illusion.
When you finally confront the demon, use your wit and capabilities to convince it to join you.
Use the Wild Card Arcana - the embodiment of your infinite potential - to ensnare the demon and tame it.
You won\'t be alone in your quest. There are other players that are currently preventing the demon menace.
If you encounter one of them, you can even trade informations about the demon you\'ve captured.
That\'s all the support I can give you. Best of luck.
Long Nose
